content: Hi Anna. Could you create a stream for the international community outside of Europe?
Very good idea!
Dear Gregg, we have created a public stream CLAIRE/International and you have been subscribed to this stream.
Thank you Alexa.
Hey everybody. :)
Excellent idea! And hello from New Zealand!
sender_full_name: Michael Winikoff (Victoria University of Wellington, NZ)

content: Hello from L'Aquila, Italy!!!
Hello Everyone, Satya from Austria

Hello, greetings from Bochum, Germany :)
Dorothea
Hello, Greetings from South Korea. Can anyone please tell me the objective of this group. Thanks

Hello to all. I am glad to join. Here's the lnk to the EU project we coordinate on the sustainability of AI in Finance:
https://www.fintech-ho2020.eu
If you are interested have a lokk and try our open source code and solutions

Greetings from Rome! Is there a group dedicated to Italy? Thanks in advance.
Joseph
Dear Joseph. Yes, there is a stream dedicated to Italy (CLAIRE/IT). I have added you to the group!

Dear all,
thank you very much indeed for inviting me to join this community, which I'm truly excited of being part of.
I'm a lawyer (quite focused on innovation), practicing in Italy as well as in the UK, and I really hope to give a small contribute on AI implementation for legal services.
I'd like to share with you an interesting questionnaire I did today for European AI Alliance:
https://ec.europa.eu/eusurvey/runner/Trustworthy_AI_Assessment_Pilot_20_Stakeholder
My main goals are to implement blockchain for ADR (alternative dispute resolution methods) and AI for smart contracts.
Looking forward to having your kind feedbacks and to welcoming any spark of discussion on the above.
Kind regards
Antonello

Dear Antonello,
Thank you for bringing this to our attention! Besides this Stakeholder version, will there also be an AI Researcher/Developer version?
Justus

Hi Justus,
yep, it is: https://ec.europa.eu/eusurvey/runner/Trustworthy_AI_Assessment_Pilot_20_Main
For registration: https://ec.europa.eu/futurium/en/eu-ai-alliance
Enjoy!
Antonello
HI All, from TNO, The Netherlands, this is Tjerk

Hello from L'Aquila, Italy!!!

yet an other AI entusiast from L'Aquila here!
Giovanni DG
Hi there. Glad to see so many like-minded people professionals here. Greetings from Luxembourg.
Hi all, great initiative! Greetings from the Netherlands.
And more Dutch greetings. Looking forward to lots of exciting challenges and constructive collaborations.
Hello from Thessaloniki, Greece.
Hello to all from Spain! Great to be here!!
Greetings from Poznan! Nice to meet you all of you.
Hello from Istanbul!
